award_title: Collaborative Research: Bones and Burrowing: Mechanoadaptation in phylogeny, ontogeny and ecology of Peromyscus
subject: Re: methods reuse in biomechanics
body:
Sandra,

Most computational methods get published once and never run againâ€”even when they'd be useful to others.

I'm working on Ouro, which wraps computational workflows behind simple APIs so other researchers can actually reuse them without reimplementing everything.

Wondering if you've hit this with your imaging and modeling pipelines. A lot of biomechanics work seems to stay locked in individual labs.

Worth a quick call in January?

Best,

Matt Moderwell
https://ouro.foundation
